feed.title: go-proxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.2
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Fixed wrong default value for host in some scenerios
  • Fixed possible resource leak for docker watcher
  • Fixed go-proxy ls-* options stuck when there's a failing docker provider
  • Changed docker watcher will now reconnect every 3 secs on failure until cancel
  • Old: returns error after three trials, does not reconnect even when docker provider recovered
  • Changed environment variables GOPROXY_*_PORT to GOPROXY_*_ADDR, now api server defaults to listening on "127.0.0.1:8888" instead of ":8888"

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.3
entry.content:
What's changed?

  • Fixed tcp / udp listening on wrong port in some scenerios
  • Fixed deadlock connecting / closing docker clients
  • Fixed docker watcher not working properly
  • Fixed remote docker disconnect and reconnect causing nil dereference crash
  • Improved idlewatcher will now check if target site is ready before proxying
  • Improved I/O handling for tcp / udp
  • Changed: UDP Buffer size 1500 -> 8192

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.5.2...0.5.3

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.31
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Now support listening on 0 port (random port) for TCP/UDP stream, good for testing things out, or when you don't know what ports are available
  • Docker image shrinked from ~57MB to ~24MB

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.5.3...0.5.31

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.4
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Fixed path_pattern regex
  • Improved proxy.<alias>.port can now be empty for tcp/udp
  • Improved default scheme and port detection
  • Now most containers work without any labels defined

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.5.31...0.5.4
